title: Apple Arcade FAQ: ‘Oddmar+’ and ‘Dandara: Trials of Fear+’ are now available
content: Gaming subscription services are all the rage now, but Apple Arcade isn’t quite like Google Stadia or Xbox Live. So if you’ve got questions about it, we’ve got plenty of answers. Updated 12/03/21: Two new games have been added to Apple Arcade, both of which have previously appeared in the App Store. Dandara: Trials of […]
